thread.section_title: Rydges Kensington London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Enjoyable break
thread.title_full: Enjoyable break - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: andrew d
title: Enjoyable break
text:
Very nice hotel in an excellent position with nearby tube station and many local amenities.
Superior room decent size for London and proved quiet and relaxing.
Staff very helpful throughout.
Breakfast very good, catering for cooked and continental tastes but the big let down was the Jam Cupboard restaurant where we had a very poor evening meal.
Would happily stay there again avoiding the restaurant
